column4: Ubuntu virgin here (so please don't speak Ubuntu speak as I won't understand). I need some help please. How do I connect my digital tape camcorder to my laptop using ubuntu 11 ? I plug in the usb and get nothing, not even recognised as a data media

Ubuntu virgin here (so please don't speak Ubuntu speak as I won't understand). I need some help please. How do I connect my digital tape camcorder to my laptop using ubuntu 11 ? I plug in the usb and get nothing, not even recognised as a data media
You may need to put your camcorder in USB mode
It may really be the Camcorder playing hardball at this point - perhaps if you get the manual for the camcoder out and look for USB function?
